import React from 'react'; const Footer = () => { const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); const socialLinks = [ { name: 'Facebook', icon: ( ), href: '#' }, { name: 'Instagram', icon: ( ), href: '#' }, { name: 'LinkedIn', icon: ( ), href: '#' }, { name: 'Twitter', icon: ( ), href: '#' } ]; const quickLinks = [ { name: 'Services', href: '#services' }, { name: 'Why Choose Us', href: '#why-choose-us' }, { name: 'Contact', href: '#contact' } ]; return (
